mapper.select: SELECT ID,NAME, GENDER, t.CODENAME AS TYPE, PROFILE FROM PETINFO p LEFT JOIN TYPECODE t ON p."TYPE" = t.CODEID WHERE USER_EMAIL =#{user_email} AND p.DELFLAG='N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PETINFO (ID, USER_EMAIL, NAME, BIRTH, WEIGHT, GENDER, "TYPE", TYPEINFO, ANIREGISTNUM, NOTIFICATION, PROFILE, DELFLAG) VALUES(#{id}, #{user_email}, #{name}, #{birth}, #{weight}, #{gender}, #{type}, #{typeinfo}, #{aniregistnum}, #{notification}, #{profile}, 'N')
mapper.select: SELECT ID, NAME, BIRTH, WEIGHT, GENDER, t.CODENAME AS "TYPE" , TYPEINFO, NOTIFICATION, PROFILE FROM PETINFO p LEFT JOIN TYPECODE t ON p."TYPE" = t.CODEID WHERE USER_EMAIL =#{user_email} AND NAME=#{name}
